name: A/B Subscreen with L/R + EX1/EX2 scrolling
author: Evan20000
info: Enables you to cycle both buttons without opening a menu.
description: Exactly what it looks like on the tin
setup: Paste the codeblock somewhere in your script file that isn't in any other codeblock.Now pasteHaveANotShittySubscreen();into your global script's while loop. Have fun.
